benchmark_details.name: EXPRESS (EXperiences and PRocessed Emotions in Self-disclosure Stories)
benchmark_details.overview: EXPRESS is a benchmark dataset curated from Reddit communities featuring 251 fine-grained, self-disclosed emotion labels, designed to evaluate the emotion recognition capabilities of language models.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate modelsâ€™ emotion recognition capabilities and facilitate potential emotion alignment.

data.annotation: Self-disclosed emotions extracted from user posts

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the predicted versus actual self-disclosed emotions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better alignment of predicted emotions with self-disclosed emotions.
methodology.validation: Evaluation on various models using different prompting strategies.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Data is anonymized to protect user identities.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: Self-disclosed emotions are used without external annotations.
